item.title: AI Refactor and App Store Submission: A Developer's Journey
item.description: log detailing the refactoring of an AI unit, the ups and downs of app store submission, and the decision to streamline by removing subscription clutter. Follow the journey of building, breaking, fixing, and repeating.
